channel.title: 317 [PI] Loyalty Rank porblem
channel.description:
So i have added everything right, and the loyalty ranks show i just get this ingame and not exactly sure how to fix ive been over my codes 3-4 times and cant figure it out was wondering if anyone has any idea how to fix? would be very appreciated.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qxnrdi.png[/img]

item.title: 317 [PI] Loyalty Rank porblem
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

theres actually 3 problems here,

1st. no space inbetween the name and title.
2nd. as u can see i say “HEY” and it appears half way in the chat box.
3rd. if someone else speaks you get this “@or2@@whi@” that covers the other persons speech.
